nodes.text: Wellam Adarios was a captain in the Imperial Navy of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War against the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Shortly after the Imperial attack on a Rebel base on the planet Arda-1, Adarios was stationed in orbit of the planet Ord Radama as captain of the Interdictor-class Star Destroyer Eternal Wrath.

Wellam Adarios first appeared in Onslaught at Arda I, an adventure module for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game released in 2014. It is possible for players to run into the Eternal Wrath while they travel to Ord Radama, but only if they fail to make a specified course correction. If they do they must persuade the ship's crew to let them pass despite having outdated access codes, otherwise Adarios calls for them to be brought aboard for questioning and sends TIE fighters to destroy them if they try to escape. This article assumes that players were successful and so did not encounter the Star Destroyer or its captain.
